title: great service small room
text: Like other reviewers I found the rooms small. However, I was traveling by myself and the bathroom was roomy. The room was very clean and fairly new furnishings. Exercise room was more than I expected. The staff was exceptionally friendly and accomodating. It is just around the corner f/ Michigan Ave., close to Northwestern Hospital. All very convenient. Great place at a reasonable price. I'd stay here again.
